english: The next wave of this enemy is coming

chinese: 语言设置需要重启游戏，请点击确认退出
english: The language setting requires a restart of the game，please click Confirm to exit

chinese: 每隔数个回合自动叠甲
english: Automatically stacks armor every few turns

chinese: 每隔数个回合自动叠甲
为自己叠加1回合的2护甲
对敌人造成两点伤害的同时，为自己叠加1回合的2护甲
english: Deal 2 damage to enemies and stack 2 armor for 1 turn
